name: Entreprise Nexmoov inc.
description: Developer of a real estate platform intended to offer insights and analysis for residential real estate. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence, geospatial and user-generated data to quantify lifestyle and location qualities for any address in the US and Canada, enabling real estate developers to understand the demand of citizens and begin conversations with a transparent and organized understanding of what a city and community need.
one_liner: Developer of a real estate platform intended to offer insights and analysis for residential real estate. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence, geospatial and user-generated data to quantify lifestyle and location qualities for any address in the US and Canada, enabling real estate developers to understand the demand of citizens and begin conversations with a transparent and organized understanding of what a city and community need.
